devdoc.details: This smart contract contains the actual core operator logic.

constructor.details: This function is called by the deployer/factory when creating a contract.

init(bytes).details: This function is called by the deployer/factory when creating a contract.

_baseBondAmount.details: Minimum amount of tokens needed for bonding.

_blockTime.details: Internal number (in seconds), used for defining a window for operator to execute the job.

_bondedAmounts.details: Internal mapping of bonded operator amounts.

_bondedOperators.details: Internal mapping of bonded operators, to prevent double bonding.

_operatorJobs.details: Internal mapping of operator job details for a specific job hash.

_operatorPodIndex.details: Internal mapping of bonded operators, to prevent double bonding.

_operatorTempStorage.details: Internal mapping of operator addresses, used for temp storage when defining an operator job.

_operatorTempStorageCounter.details: Internal index used for storing/referencing operator temp storage.

_operatorThreshold.details: The threshold used for limiting number of operators in a pod.

_operatorThresholdDivisor.details: The threshold divisor used for increasing bond amount once threshold is reached.

_operatorThresholdStep.details: The threshold step used for increasing bond amount once threshold is reached.

_podMultiplier.details: The multiplier used for calculating bonding amount for pods.

constructor.notice: Used internally to initialize the contract instead of through a constructor

init(bytes).notice: Used internally to initialize the contract instead of through a constructor
